Package org.twelve.usecases.trade

Class TradeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.usecases.trade.TradeRepository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TradeUtility
    public abstract class TradeRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Repository for storing all trades in the system.

      • createTradeEntity

        public int createTradeEntity​(java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                             java.lang.String place,
                             boolean isPermanent,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> tradersIds,
                             java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> itemsIds)
        Creates a new Trade object to be edited.
        Parameters:
        time - Time of the Trade
        place - Location of the Trade
        isPermanent - Whether the Trade is permanent or not
        tradersIds - An ordered list of each trader participating
        itemsIds - The items involved in this trade.
        Returns:
        the id of the created trade

      • addToTrades

        public void addToTrades​(int id,
                        boolean isPermanent,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> traderIDs,
                        java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> itemIDs,
                        int editedCounter,
                        java.lang.String tradeStatus,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> tradeCompletions,
                        java.lang.String time,
                        java.lang.String location)
        Adds a new trade and its timePlace that exist in the database
        Parameters:
        id - id of trade and timePlace
        isPermanent - if the trade is permanent
        traderIDs - list of all ids of the traders
        itemIDs - list of all the ids of the items
        editedCounter - counter for how many edits were made
        tradeStatus - status of the trade
        tradeCompletions - The Completion status of the trades
        time - the time of the trade
        location - the location of the trade
